pr_title: Fix bug in meta cache in MetadataCachingBaseFileSystem

timeline.message: fix bug in meta cache in MetadataCachingBaseFileSystem

timeline.author: ZacBlanco
ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: can you undo the changes to this indentation?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText:
We should be logging any exceptions here instead of calling printStackTrace
Example:
at the top of the class
private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(MetadataCache.class);
then in here and the other try/catch
LogUtils.warnWithException(LOG, "Failed to cache metadata", e)
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: same comments about logging and catching exceptions here.
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

replies.bodyText: Sure. It should be ExecutionException and log the error info.
replies.author: QianxiZhang

timeline.bodyText: Generally, it's not a good practice to catch Exception - we should really only catch exceptions that we know can be thrown. Is there a list of exceptions you know could be thrown here?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco

timeline.bodyText: good to be explicit on which Exception we are catching here?
timeline.author: apc999

timeline.bodyText: Puts the status into cache. or the style checker will fail and complain
timeline.author: apc999
apc999

timeline.message: change Exception to ExecutionException and fix some format issues
change Exception to ExecutionException and fix some format issues
change Exception to ExecutionException and fix some format issues

timeline.message: Use warn instead of error as this is best effort
